mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.shop_id AS "shopId", a.office_id AS "officeId", a.product_type_id AS "productTypeId", a.product_type_name AS "productTypeName", a.product_name AS "productName", a.product_char AS "productChar", concat(a.product_name,'(',a.product_char,')') AS "pingyinStr", a.product_no AS "productNo", a.buy_price AS "buyPrice", a.shop_price AS "shopPrice", a.warn_stock AS "warnStock", a.unit AS "unit", a.spec AS "spec", a.list_no AS "listNo", a.remark AS "remark", a.one_url AS "oneUrl", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_product( id, shop_id, office_id, product_type_id, product_type_name, product_name, product_char, product_no, buy_price, shop_price, warn_stock, unit, spec, list_no, remark, one_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{shopId}, #{officeId}, #{productTypeId}, #{productTypeName}, #{productName}, ${productChar}, #{productNo}, #{buyPrice}, #{shopPrice}, #{warnStock}, #{unit}, #{spec}, #{listNo}, #{remark}, #{oneUrl}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
